CustomField.description: Used by development's load process. This field allows multiple records to be grouped in the same data load. This is a manual field set by the person doing the upload. It is used differently from field sfl_load_process_id.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used by development's load process. This field allows multiple records to be grouped in the same data load. This is a manual field set by the person doing the upload. It is used differently from field sfl_load_process_id.
CustomField.label: sfl load group id
